TopicTitle: Station ONE (a Kerbal Space Program Cinematic)

Articles.Content: Just finished off a short cinematic which is more of a test of colour grading than anything else, however the cinematics at the end of my kethane station/war series have had increasing popularity, so I thought I'd share this quick demo here. Hoping that somebody might enjoy it, not to mention this is also a bit of an introduction to my channel for any newcomers.
Beautiful, definitely worth de-orbiting a space station for that, bravo!!
